text: @senatemajldr Democrats under the leadership of Pelosi and Schumer are delaying reaching a deal bec of their $1 trillion demand for aid to states & cities w/c doesn't have anything to do with the coronavirus and will be susceptible & wide open for corruption by blue state & city officials.
